content.text:
# Draft:Sigli (software company)

----
}}
Sigli is a European software development and AI engineering company headquartered in Antwerp, Belgium. The company works on digital product engineering, data-driven systems and applied AI implementations for organisations in Europe and the United Kingdom.
History
Sigli was founded in 2015 and initially focused on custom software and product engineering. Later coverage describes the company’s involvement in projects related to accessibility technology as well as small and mid-sized enterprise deployments of AI.
Operations
Public sources describe Sigli’s activities across product discovery, UX/UI, software engineering, cloud and DevOps, and applied AI for business value measurement.
Media coverage
Independent media have covered the company’s approach to AI delivery and value-over-growth positioning.
See also
* Artificial intelligence in business
* Software engineering
